Package model

Class GameBuilder

java.lang.Object
model.GameBuilder
public final class GameBuilder extends Object
This class contains the methods for creating a new game based on its type and initializing the various game components.

    • build

      public static Game build(NewGameInfo newGameInfo) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method creates a new Game instance based on the type of game the user wants to create.
      Parameters:
      newGameInfo - record containing information of a Game creation request
      Returns:
      a new Game instance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if newGameInfo contains unsupported or unknown info

      Returns:
